pageContext.title: UltraBomb joins DC Jam Records
pageContext.content: We are super stoked to announce that UltraBomb will be joining the DC-Jam Records family! The band consists of a group of heavy music industry hitters that include Greg Norton (Husker Du), Finny McConnell (The Mahones), & Jamie Oliver (UK Subs). Their new album ‘Time to Burn’ will be available soon on red and black vinyl, CD, & on all digital platforms. A major U.S. and European tour to follow. More info coming very soon!
